title: They're FINALLY here!!!! - lttstore.com desk pads
description: The LTTStore.com desk pads are finally here, so you can order one at  and don't forget to get an SC long sleeve shirt while you're at it too at   You've seen them around for months, and now they're finally out. It took a while, but hey, we got there! They come in a wide variety of sizes, and well, you might want to order one now, or you might have to wait a bit until they come back in stock!  The LTT video on testing the mousepad isn't up yet; keep your eyes peeled when it does drop.
